channel.title: Onwers spell help /adding spells
channel.description: ok i was looking in client and going through player rights and came across a spell ID 12037 (its a magic spell) i want to know how to add it to the regular magic menu. also i dont want to have any runes or items when i use this spell. can some 1 be descriptive :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2009, 06:27:02 pm[/size][hr]can any 1 help :)
